Tab

directives.name: AotwDropdownDirective

components.name: AotwBreadcrumbComponent
AotwChipComponent
AotwChipGroupComponent
AotwDynamicTextComponent
AotwFormFieldComponent
AotwIconComponent
AotwLabelComponent
AotwListItemComponent
AotwSkeletonComponent
AotwStepperComponent
components.templateData:
<aotw-stepper>
  @for (step of steps; let i = $index; track i) {
    <aotw-step
      [active]="activeStep === i"
      [disabled]="step.disabled"
      (click)="setActiveStep(i)"
    >
      {{ step.label }}
    </aotw-step>
  }
</aotw-stepper>

components.name: AotwTabGroupComponent
AotwYearPickerComponent
components.templateData:
@for (year of activeRange | range; track $index) {
  • {{ year }}
    • }
